item.title: Halsey Bids $585,000 for Portrait of Herself by Director Julian Schnabel at Venice AmfAR Charity Gala: ‘I’m Feeling on Top of the World’
item.description: At AmfAR Venezia, filmmaker Julian Schnabel accepted a tribute award from Jude Law before auctioning off a one-of-a-kind experience: The director and artist, at the Venice Film Festival to premiere hi
